issue.title: [Dev] "DEBUG=1 merge_arrow_pr.py" updates Jira issue
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11941](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11941). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
"DEBUG=1 dev/merge_arrow_pr.py" acts as a dryrun without writing anything.
It doesn't merge PR, but it does updates the Jira issue status. Should be fixed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11941?focusedCommentId=17301658) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Resolved by PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9706
